definition: surname Gui/abbr. for Guangxi Autonomous Region 廣西壯族自治區|广西壮族自治区[Guang3 xi1 Zhuang4 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 qu1]

sentences.chinese: 桂皮可以減輕關節疼痛。

sentences.english: Yes, We don't have the cinnamon.
An HPLC method for determination of cinnamaldehyde in cassia bark capsules was developed.
sentences.chinese: 報道了桂皮膠囊中桂皮醛的高效液相色譜分析方法。

sentences.english: An HPLC method for determination of cinnamaldehyde in cassia bark capsules was developed.
sentences.chinese: 報道了桂皮膠囊中桂皮醛的高效液相色譜分析方法。

sentences.english: Objective To establish a thin layer chromatography scanning method for the determination of cinnamaldehyde content in Qianzheng Plaster.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立牽正膏中桂皮醛含量的薄層掃描測定方法。

sentences.english: A rapid and simple method for the determination of cinnamaldehyde content in cassia was established.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一種快速測定桂皮中桂皮醛含量的方法。

sentences.english: A rapid and simple method for the determination of cinnamaldehyde content in cassia was established.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一種快速測定桂皮中桂皮醛含量的方法。

sentences.english: I have perfumed my bed with myrrh, aloes, and cinnamon.
sentences.chinese: 我又用沒藥，沉香，桂皮，薰了我的榻。

sentences.english: Whisk in the sugar, salt, vanilla and cinnamon until combined.
sentences.chinese: 加入白糖，鹽，香草精與桂皮粉，攪拌均勻。

sentences.english: Fruit paste aromas are complexed by ground black pepper, clove and cinnamon aromas.
sentences.chinese: 黑胡椒，丁香和桂皮芳香的完美結合。

sentences.english: I have perfumed my bed with myrrh, aloes and cinnamon.
sentences.chinese: 我又用沒藥，沉香，桂皮薰了我的榻。

sentences.english: Skin the color of cinnamon. His eyes light up and I melt within.
sentences.chinese: 他的眼睛像桂皮的表皮的顏色讓我感動不已。

sentences.english: Combine cinnamon powder with honey and form it into paste.
sentences.chinese: 結合桂皮粉，蜂蜜和形式到粘貼。

sentences.english: These spices include clove, cinnamon, allspice, ginger , and nutmeg.
sentences.chinese: 這些香料包括丁香，桂皮，多香果，姜和肉豆蔻。

sentences.english: Put tea leaf, anise cinnamon and myrcia in the gauze and tight it.
sentences.chinese: 將茶葉，八角，桂皮和香葉放入紗布中並綁緊。

definition: Thai ginger/lesser galangale (Kaempferia galanga)/cyanide (loanword)/same as 氰化
